SamPy.bolshoi.collecthalomassesThreadingÂ¶

For some reason this script does not work. I am not sure what’s wrong in it, but the finding part does not work, but randomly dies. It might be something to do with threads getting confused which file they are supposed to open or something...

Functions

combineFiles(files, outputfile) Combines the content of all files that are listed in the files list to a single file named outputfile.
findDMDriver(input_files, times[, cores]) Main driver function of the wrapper.
writeOutput(data, file, times) Writes the output data to ascii files.
